00012 class CMVCard extends CMError implements CMObject {
00013  
00019  private $data = array();
00020  
00027  private $version = "3.0";
00028  
00035  public function CMVCard($version = "3.0") {
00036   $this->setVersion($version);
00037  }
00038  
00044  public function getVersion() {
00045   return $this->version;
00046  }
00047  
00054  public function setVersion($newVersion) {
00055   // validate version
00056   if($newVersion != "2.1" && $newVersion != "3.0") {
00057    $this->throwWarning("vCard version $newVersion is not supported, using 3.0");
00058    $this->version = "3.0";
00059    return true;
00060   }
00061   
00062   $this->version = $newVersion;
00063   return true;
00064  }
00065  
00074  public function get($property) {
00075   return $this->data[strtoupper($property)];
00076  }
00077  
00090  public function set($property, $value, $attr = array()) {
00091   // $value must be an array
00092   if(!is_array($value))
00093    $value = array($value);
00094   
00095   $this->data[strtoupper($property)] = $value;
00096   return true;
00097  }
00098  
00113  public function add($property, $value, $attr = array()) {
00114   // add multiple values
00115   if(is_array($value)) {
00116    foreach($value as $v)
00117     $this->add($property, $v);
00118    return true;
00119   }
00120   
00121   // add a single value
00122   $property = strtoupper($property);
00123   if(!isset($this->data[$property]))
00124    $this->data[$property] = array();
00125   array_push($this->data[$property], array('value' => $value, 'attr' => $attr));
00126   
00127   return true;
00128  }
00129  
00141  public function addUnique($property, $value) {
00142   // add multiple values
00143   if(is_array($value)) {
00144    foreach($value as $v)
00145     $this->addUnique($property, $v);
00146    return true;
00147   }
00148   
00149   // add a single value
00150   $property = strtoupper($property);
00151   if(!in_array($value, $this->data[$property]))
00152    array_push($this->data[$property], $value);
00153    
00154   return true;
00155  }
00156  
00164  public function remove($property) {
00165   $property = strtoupper($property);
00166   if(isset($this->data[$property]))
00167    unset($this->data[$property]);
00168   return true;
00169  }
00170  
00174  public function __toString() {
00175   if(isset($this->data['FN']))
00176    return "<" . get_class($this) . ": " . $this->data['FN'][0] . ">";
00177   return "<" . get_class($this) . ": (unnamed)>";
00178  }
00179  
00184  public function getDisplayName() {
00185   // use the FN if it exists
00186   if(isset($this->data['FN']))
00187    return $this->data['FN'][0]['value'];
00188    
00189   return "No name";
00190  }
00191  
00195  public function getData() {
00196   return $this->data;
00197  }

00199 }
